Title: Fight
Plot: Masters delivers a baby with ambiguous genitalia and urges the parents not to surgically assign the child a sex out of fear or convenience. Meeting Virginia at a hotel for a secret rendezvous, the two of them divide their attention between sexual role-play and a championship boxing match, prompting Virginia to unearth the truth of Masters'' troubled childhood.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
